name: Cataclysm (GammaFoxTBG, Fer-i, Alejandro PHz, maksch, struuuudel)
name_original: Cataclysm (GammaFoxTBG, Fer-i, Alejandro PHz, maksch, struuuudel)
description:
Gamepad is highly recommended! We apologize for the in-game  typo, left shift is for the card selection, not ctrl/cmd.

Power your flying feline with your deck of cards! How does that work? Where is this candy coming from? You ask too many questions!

Every 10s , your energy refills and you gain a new hand of cards to use! Use your energy wisely and take down your foes. Let us know what your best score is!

Controls

Arrow keys/ Left-stick: Move
X / LT : Crawl (slow move)
Z / RT: Shoot
Left Shift / RB: Card selection
Arrow keys  / ABXY: Choose card
